title: account for when there are no team tricodes/insert placeholder
look into api issue in prod
description:
this app is deployed at https://nba-scorez.onrender.com/ that's the frontend. it makes a call to the api at https://nba-api-nba.apps.gaspar.ontampa.dev/api/game-days?year=2026&month=2
it goes to that year and month becuase it's february 2026. that api call returns a 502 bad gateway in prod but not in local dev. figure out why this is happening and how it can be fixed
